name: Replics
summary:
This 3D action adventure is the first part of the Replics Trilogie. 
We write the year 2057 and mankind have in the meantime the 3.Worldwar behind itself. 
The life is no longer like that as it once was. 
The largest part of the planet is contaminated and uninhabitable. 
The survivors together-rotted themselves in the still habitable cities. 
Their existence is determined by XEN, an organization, which took over the rule after the war. 
 
You slip into the role of Selma Lombard, which lives in Ocean City. 
To beginning of play you are in Selma's dwelling in Ocean City. 
Thus you make on the way, without in the smallest ancestor who you are and which expects you.... 
 
Come healthy home again.
